text:
@kayleighmcenany @realDonaldTrump 116k dead from COVID-19
Cases spiking in red states
Oklahoma cases up
Police reform needed now
Supreme leader seems ill
Record unemployment
Record criming by the trump family
No tax returns yet
Who got the PPP money?
And you think the big news is some phony ticket requests
#Sad
